runs.comm: swing first up, but Khawaja has middled it just like he has been in the BBL. Gets a single to third man
on a length, pitches outside off, tails towards off, defended with an open face
full and wide, nearly a half-volley, driven to short cover
length ball angling across him after having swung two balls back in. Beats an attempted dab
short of a length, on off, defended off the front foot
slower ball, hits the outside edge of the big Watson wind-up. Just that at the last moment he reduces the bat speed, which means the edge is soft
Khawaja continues to middle everything and continues to place everything. Full outside off, driven between cover and extra cover
short of a length, wide, Watson tries the cut and is beaten. Watson is 0 off 6 balls
Watson gets off the mark, steers a shortish ball towards third man
middled it again. Chest high short ball pulled away for four over square leg

he is getting four for this. Oh my word he is getting four for this. I swear this is just tucked away gentle off the pads, but it has beaten square leg inside the circle, and the boundary on that side is really short

another boundary? Tucked away off the pad again, beats short fine leg easily, and Ashwin dives after running to his left from deep square leg. Has he kept it in? Called two so Ashwin has made the save. Well done
slower ball, short of a length, runs this down to third man for one

and Khawaja is gone. Lovely delivery from Nehra. Khawaja goes without facing a dot. It's the first time he might have got out for under fifty in a long long time. Nehra gets this length ball to hold its line, Khawaja's defensive push is not the greatest, and the outside edge carries to Dhoni. Just the right ball: not driving length, not to be pulled, and he defends just with the hands. Doesn't get close to the ball
length ball, on off, defended
short of a length, outside off, steered to third man for one
Watson exploits the short boundary. Just short of a length, and Watson rocks back to pull it just over the midwicket boundary for six
shortish, rocks back to cut this to third man for one
short of a length, just outside off, punched straight to point
length ball, angling in, Watson looks for the big drive, inside-edges it on to the pad
skiddy delivery. Short of a length, outside off, beats Watson's cut. But hang on, Bumrah has overstepped
Bumrah misses his length by six inches, and he has been punished. Low full toss, Watson makes room to drive it between mid-off and extra cover. He has overstepped again
no he won't. Another low full toss, and Watson dries him to the left of extra cover this time. Expensive mistakes
length ball outside off, pushes it for a single
angling in, bunted into the leg side for one
on a length, outside off, dabs it for a single towards short third man
lovely shot from Watson. Slower length ball, on off, angling away, Watson drives it over extra cover
another lovely shot from Watson. Slower ball, short of a length, on off, angling away, and Watson threads the gap between short third man and point with a back cut
on a length, on off, opens the face again, but this time he has placed it straight to the man at point
on a length, driven on the up, but straight to short cover
low full toss, driven to mid-on for one. A direct hit would have got him. Dhawan is the fielder
on a length, angling in, worked to leg for two
on a length, middle and leg, pushed wide of long-on for two
low full toss, swept straight to square leg
down the wicket to take this on a half-volley and drive it over mid-off for four
full, on off, drilled straight to mid-off
flatter, on a length, and he goes back to back-cut it past point for three
flat length ball, looks to late-cut it, but finds the man at point
down the wicket to drive a full ball to long-off for one
flat, quick, 99ks, turning in, takes the inside edge on to the pad
flatter, outside off, steered straight to short third
on a length, on off, punched to midwicket. Three dots. Something building up
full and fast, dug out for a single to leg
wide half-volley, slower than usual, and Watson latches on, driving it over extra cover for four
just short of a length, barely, and Marsh sees it early, goes back and back-cuts it between point and short third man for four
down the wicket, beaten in the flight, but drops this at his toes for one
swept away from middle and leg for a single
slower through the air, tempting Marsh, who pays for it. Looks for the big slog sweep, but the ball doesn't quite arrive. He is well early into the shot, and is bowled
full, on the pads, watchfully deflected away for a single
fullish, flattish, on the pads, bunted into the leg side, the bigger boundary, and has played it softly enough to be able to come back for two
on a length, middle and off, defended back
low full toss, 96ks, dug out into the leg side for a single
roundarm, 96ks again, middle and off, defended back to him
full, outside off, driven to long-off for one
roundarm again, slower in the air, bunted into the leg side for one
full and wide, just inside the tram line. Watson leaves it alone. This is almost a yorker length, but Dhoni has collected it clean. Superb take

and Yuvraj has found a new bunny after KP. First ball Maxwell looks to will a shot over extra cover, but the thing with Yuvraj is, he gives you no pace to work with. Maxwell gets no power behind this shot, and finds the man at extra cover
misfielded by Raina at point, it allows them two runs
short and wide, but the ball doesn't come on, and the cut is mistimed for a single
flatter, quicker one. Down the pads, and hits him on the pad as he tries to sweep
flat again, punched into the leg side for one
flat length ball, pushed into the leg side for one
short of a length, on the pads, worked away to long leg
short and wide, gentle pace, cut away for four. Watson reaches 50. Australia might need another 50 from him
wide length ball, but unlike Lynn in game one, Watwon has the presence of mind to not go chasing
wide length ball, just inside the tram line, Watson drives on the up, gets a single to deep cover
on a length, middle and leg, angling to off, defended from the crease
short of a length, not much room, but he has steered it square of third man for one
full and wide, just inside the tram line, driven to deep cover for one

Watson bunts this into the leg side with soft hands and takes the best arm in the team on. Jadeja hares in from deep midwicket and lets in a rocket throw inches away from the stumps. Lovely work by Dhoni too, who doesn't even collect it completely, but just almost deflects it on. Watson in by inches
flatter, not short enough to be pulled, mis-hits this to deep midwicket for one
short square boundary on the leg side, and Head has slog-swept a length ball for six over straight  midwicket
Head is going leg side no matter what. Drags this slog sweep from way outside off, and places it through cow corner for four
short of a length, outside off, and he looks to work this to leg again. To the left it goes, and Yuvraj puts in a dive to keep them to a dot
down the wicket to drive it to long-on for one
slower ball, full, pitches out leg, Pandya is lucky Head has found short fine leg

Kohli has dropped Watson. Firstly this is a wide ball that Watson has played at, and it is a low full toss, which he has hit in the air towards deep cover. Kohli charges in but charges in too far, and is on the move when it hits him high on the hand and pops out
another wide full toss, and this time Watson has placed this straight of Kohli at deep cover
too wide, and this Watson doesn't go for it. He will have to rebowl it
another big wide outside off. Perhaps a change of plan?
this time he gets the line right. Just inside the tram line. Watson looks to steer this full ball fine, but is beaten
this time Watson goes to the short leg boundary. He moves across early, and Pandya looks to bowl closer to the stumps too. Slugs the low full toss away for four
full and wide again, Watson has driven this to the left of Kohli at deep cover, and comes back for an easy second
low full toss, dug out for a single into the off side
big wide outside leg. Beats Watson's sweep
shimmy down the wicket to work a length ball into the long leg-side boundary. Pandya is a little slow, and Watson takes the second. Dhoni lets him know that he was caught on his heels a little there
low full toss outside leg, swept for a single
floats this one wide as he sees him step out. Head chips this over extra cover for a couple
short and wide, cut away to deep cover for one. Might have been a wide had he not played
quicker ball, pitches outside leg, swept to deep square leg for one

and Dhoni has missed a run-out. Watson runs the second on the misfield at deep cover. Pandya's throw is by the stumps, Watson is struggling, but Dhoni doesn't even try to collect it cleanly. He thinks he doesn't even time to make a regulation collection and whip the bails. He tries his deflection but it doesn't work
full toss, and this will do good for Watson. He has launched this over long-on
another full toss, but he has mis-hit it to long-on for one

lovely fielding by Pandya. Saves four runs. Head slogs this towards deep midwicket, Pandya goes as far back as he can, and leaps to catch this overhead, but the momentum is taking him over the boundary so he just drops this back into the field with both his feet in the air and beyond the boundary. Excellent awareness
driven to long-on for one
low full toss, drilled hard to deep midwicket
full outside leg, swept to deep square for one
full outside off, dug out to long-off for one

Watson goes over the sight screen. Ashwin has been bowling in the blind spot outside leg to Watson so far, but for the first time he bowls it in the zone, on a length, on off, and he has hit it straight over the sight screen for a six
tries the big sweep, but Ashwin beats him with a quicker one and hits the pad
swept away to deep midwicket for one
Head targets the short leg-side boundary again, but Ashwin squeezes under his bat with a full and wide floater. Just inside the tram lines
low full toss and with a short leg-side boundary for Watson. That is asking to be hit. He has slog-swept this for a six
flat outside off, punched straight of deep cover for two

meanwhile Watson has become the second Australian to score a T20I century. Sweeps this flat delivery into the short leg-side boundary. A stiff effort from Yuvraj at the fence, and Watson has his arms aloft. What an effort leading from the front
and Watson is threatening du Plessis's record now. Wide half-volley, Watson is on a knee, and crashes this over long-off for another six. This is carnage now
Watson targets the short leg boundary, but Jadeja is too wide, and he toe-ends it to long-on for one

fires in a yorker at 102ks, and squeezes it under Head's bat to knock the middle stump over. Some solace for Jadeja after he was put on a hiding to nothing bowling to a set Watson with the short leg-side boundary
lovely yorker, on the crease, dug out straight to extra cover
low full toss, but he has bowled to his field. Concedes the single to long-off
too straight as Bumrah goes short of a length, and Lynn has deftly deflected it fine of short fine leg. Good awareness of the field
low full toss, hit straight to extra cover where Ashwin decides against going for the direct hit, which can get Lynn out
lovely bowling from wide on the crease and low into the toes of Watson. They steal one but he has denied Watson a boundary this over
low full toss into the pads, concedes just the single to deep midwicket
low full toss, hit into his own toe by Lynn. Nehra gets away with it
low full toss, can't get under it, and gets only the single to long-on
another low full toss, dragged to deep midwicket for one
misses his length, just short of a yorker, and Watson gets under it to wallop it over long-on for another six
full, outside off, steered to point for one. Ashwin doesn't attempt the direct hit
Nehra misses the length but Lynn fails to capitalise. Hits a half-volley straight to long-off for one
quick, into the pads, nearly a yorker, goes just for the leg-bye
full toss, gets a little big on him, hits him high on the bat and goes just for the single to long-off. excellent bowling from Bumrah. Watson now has the highest score by a T20I captain
finally Lynn gets under a low full toss, and drags it to deep midwicket for four to the big leg-side boundary

lovely bowling by Bumrah and a lovely catch by Jadeja. Follows Lynn with a full ball as Lynn back away. Lynn manages to scoop it towards cow corner, but Jadeja makes a lot of ground to his right from deep midwicket and takes this with a dive

full and straight, Watson fails to get under it, and Dhoni has missed another run-out. Jadeja's throw is really quick, but is slightly full. Dhoni has to be quick to collect and whip the bails off, but he mistimes his collection and is hit on the finger. Looks like he has hurt himself
full and straight again, Watson has dug this out towards deep square leg. He risks the second, and Pandya fumbles to allow them an easy second
